DOC.brief_summary: In placebo control study investigator aim investigate effect 3 month vitamin D supplementation parameter immune , endocrine metabolic system healthy woman men . Vitamin D. In pilot study investigator show increase certain immune cell , regulate immunotolerance , investigator therefore try confirm result placebo group . Furthermore investigator assess effect vitamin D glucose metabolism hormone level .
DOC.brief_title: Immune Metabolic Effects Vitamin D Supplementation Healthy Humans
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize double-blind placebo control trial , aim investigate effect Vitamin D supplementation parameter immune , endocrine metabolic system healthy human without diabetes obesity . The primary aim ass effect vitamin D supplementation number function peripheral regulatory T-cells ( Tregs ) . The investigator measure Tregs baseline monthly 3 month . Furthermore investigator assess additional immune cell adaptive immunosystem . Furthermore investigator perform standard mixed meal tolerance test baseline 3 month follow supplementation order ass insulin secretion vivo .
DOC.criteria: Age > = 10 year healthy subject without chronic disease Hypercalcemia > 2,65 mmol/L pregnancy lactation period acute infection chronic disease require treatment
